name: Scan Jumbo Peanuts Chilli
description: These peanuts are carefully chosen from the selected farmers with the correct size, which is a larger peanut than usually found around the world. With very strict hygienic conditions the products is processed and packed with an Oxygen absorbent to prevent possible moisture entering the pack. These peanuts are not genetically, modified. Special care is taken to keep the product.These peanuts are carefully chosen from the selected farmers with the correct size, which is a larger peanut than usually found around the world.
